channel.title: Yoursite!
channel.description: Ok here is a website you can use for your server and before I get flammdfor posting it. [code]4) NEW RULE: NON-SERVER & NON-CLIENT DOWNLOADS ARE ALLOWED (e.g. tools)! This has never been allowed before, but hey, we decided to give it a go. The tool posted must follow all rules and have an appropriate connection to RS2 private servers. If rules start to get broken and content gets out of hand, this rule will be revoked, and no longer will we allow non-server/non-client material to be posted.[/code] [hr] [IMG]http://i667.photobucket.com/albums/vv37/krackkidsspics/site5.jpg[/img] [hr] [hr] Download: http://uppit.com/v/D51R6Q3V [hr] Editing!: Start by looking for [code]Web_site_name_here[/code] and changing [code]Web_site_name_here[/code] to your site name. [hr] Banner look for [code]Banner goes here just put it in the images folder and follow what I say on forums.[/code] replace that with[code][/code] Note name your banner "banner.jpg" BTW make sure you know the height and width of the banner you are using add to the spots [code]### = where width[/code] goes and [code]@@@ = where height[/code] goes. [hr] Then the rest is mostly easy look for [code]link 1-6[/code]add link with the code like [code]Link 1[/code] [hr] For notice and update just look for [code]Notice 1-6[/code] and [code]1st-6th update[/code] and replace with your updates. [hr] Staff list basic same as above [code]*owner*= the owner co-owner = co-owner and so on.[/code] [hr] Vote for me thing [code]Your Vote link here[/code] make it a link. example[code]Vote here![/code] [hr] [hr] Just Edit the txt file in notepad/wordpad and File>Save as>Index.html Then upload to any hosting site NOT GOING TO LIST ANY! Then enjoy^^ and if this is for some reason not aloud please lock ASAP. thank you and btw all designs by me. and please no spamming or flamming inless you really need to :|

item.title: Yoursite!
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Ok here is a website you can use for your server and before I get flammdfor posting it.

4) NEW RULE: NON-SERVER & NON-CLIENT DOWNLOADS ARE ALLOWED (e.g. tools)! This has never been allowed before, but hey, we decided to give it a go. The tool posted must follow all rules and have an appropriate connection to RS2 private servers. If rules start to get broken and content gets out of hand, this rule will be revoked, and no longer will we allow non-server/non-client material to be posted.

[hr]

site5.jpg1023×543

[hr]
[hr]
Download: http://uppit.com/v/D51R6Q3V
[hr]
Editing!:
Start by looking for <title>Web_site_name_here</title> and changing Web_site_name_here to your site name.
[hr]
Banner look for Banner goes here just put it in the images folder and follow what I say on forums. replace that with<img src="Images/banner.jpg" width="###" height="@@@"> Note name your banner “banner.jpg” BTW make sure you know the height and width of the banner you are using add to the spots ### = where width goes and @@@ = where height goes.
[hr]
Then the rest is mostly easy look for link 1-6add link with the code like <a href="http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf">Link 1</a>
[hr]
For notice and update just look for Notice 1-6 and 1st-6th update and replace with your updates.
[hr]
Staff list basic same as above *owner*= the owner co-owner = co-owner and so on.
[hr]
Vote for me thing Your Vote link here make it a link. example<a href="http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf">Vote here!</a>
[hr]
[hr]
Just Edit the txt file in notepad/wordpad and File>Save as>Index.html
Then upload to any hosting site NOT GOING TO LIST ANY!
Then enjoy^^ and if this is for some reason not aloud please lock ASAP.
thank you and btw all designs by me.
and please no spamming or flamming inless you really need to

Read full topic
